channel.title: BLE on InPlay Doc
channel.description: Recent content in BLE on InPlay Doc

item.title: GATT Programming Guide
item.description: GATT Programming Guide # Overview # GATT is a standard BLE protocol, which is based on the ATT protocol. The ATT protocol describes the structure and the access method of Attribute, the basic data unit of BLE. ATT is equivalent to a base class, while Generic Attribute Profile (GATT) is a derived class. It reorganizes attributes and constructs the structure of data access in the application layer - Service/Characteristic. It defines the methods and mechanisms of the data structures including Discover, Read, Write, and Notify/Indicate.
